verses.roman:
tato muṣṭika-cāṇūra
śala-tośalakādikān
amātyān hastipāṁś caiva
samāhūyāha bhoja-rāṭ

synonyms: tataḥ—then; muṣṭika-cāṇūra-śala-tośalaka-ādikān—Muṣṭika, Cāṇūra, Śala, Tośala and others; amātyān—his ministers; hasti-pān—his elephant-keepers; ca eva—also; samāhūya—calling together; āha—spoke; bhoja-rāṭ—the King of the Bhojas.
translation: The King of the Bhojas next called for his ministers, headed by Muṣṭika, Cāṇūra, Śala and Tośala, and also for his elephant-keepers. The King addressed them as follows.
